title: White chocolate and passion fruit cheesecake
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon melted butter', '100g digestive biscuits, crushed', '4 tablespoons melted butter', '110g white chocolate, chopped', '125ml single cream', '225g cream cheese, softened', '225g mascarpone cheese', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '3 egg yolks', '125ml passion fruit pulp', '3 egg whites', '4 tablespoons icing sugar for dusting', '6 passion fruits, pulp removed']
